example.name: autogen1
example.text: the earlier fertility-control methods released to unblinking , uncritical cheers from educated people who should have known better
example.arg: from educated people who should have known better

example.name: autogen2
example.text: By 10:25 , the Dow had turned up for the day , prompting cheers on trading desks and exchange floors .
example.arg: on trading desks and exchange floors
